wikitext.*:
'''''cirith''''' is a noun meaning "pass" or "cleft" in [[Sindarin]].<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, entry ''kir''</ref> Compare with the [[Quenya]] term ''[[cilya]]''.

==Examples==
* ''[[Cirith Gorgor]]'' = "Pass of Horror"
* ''[[Cirith Ninniach]]'' = "Pass of the Slender Crossing"
* ''[[Cirith Ungol]]'' = "Cleft of the Spider"

{{references}}
* [http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/sindar/dict-sd-en.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] compiled by [[Didier Willis]]
